Investments

Explanatory notes for the following statistics:
43211 Survey of investments: energy and water supply
47415 Structural survey of service activities


43211 Survey of investments: energy and water supply
==============================================

Definition:
Investments comprise the gross additions of tangible fixed
assets capitalised in the business year.
This includes leased goods to be capitalised by the lessee
(financial leasing) and own-account production of fixed
assets. For fixed assets under construction and for advance
payments regarding fixed assets, only the work performed in
the business year is to be included.
Not included are the acquisition of participating interests,
securities etc. (financial assets), the acquisition of
concessions, patents, licences etc., and the acquisition of
whole enterprises or establishments, investments in branch
establishments or kind-of-activity units abroad, and the
costs of financing the investments.
The gross additions are to be reported exclusive of the
turnover tax deductible as input tax.


47415 Structural survey of service activities
=======================================

Definition:
Gross fixed capital formation consists of the gross
additions of fixed tangible and intangible assets during the
reference year, provided they
- have been capitalised or included in the register
of fixed assets and
- are intended for permanent use in the survey unit
(with a useful life of at least one year).
This includes leased goods to be capitalised by the lessee.
